Talon:

"Thanks for teh info Legacy" Said the female by comlink  "We will b=
e ready for everyone" She opened a  chanel to Lord Perseus "Lord Perseus, n=
ot only Rodimus and Nightlight are Pow... Rodimus captured Windlord too... =
He was captured while we tried to capture Rodimus..."She added with sorrow =

Sent: Saturday, February=
 06, 2010 12:57 PM

Subject: Re: The Old Maximal=
 Base/Unicron's come back


  
>Before shutting himself down for a rest, Tu=
cson's extremely sharp audio receptors pick up Legacy's transmission, which=
 gets him to quickly sit up. He says nothing as he listens intently to the =
message.
>
>>" Greetings, Legacy, this is Autobot Tucson responding to your=
 message. I have been on leave due to severe damages taken during a battle =
some time ago, which have left part of my memory erased. I - am now with Lo=
rd Perseus's Maximal group, in recovery from another damage taken in battle=
."
>
>>He sighs.
>
>>"Sorry, - I'm - just not a hundred percent at the - mo=
ment. Anyway, you may be able to answer this question for me. I - need to k=
now, if - there are - any remaining Autobots still functioning. " 

There w=
as a slight pause on the transmission line before Legacy's voice resumed tr=
ansmission, "Yes, there are several Autobots that still continue to functio=
n. However at this time it is the Maximals who are serving as the dominant =
protective force for this region."

Switching gear slightly Legacy continue=
d talking, "I have detected indeterminant energy signatures coming from an =
area near the vacated maximal base that may indicate Minion activity. I req=
uire a situation report."

<TAG>

> OOC: I believe Lord Elder and his team =
are still guarding the Ark. Also, I think Legacy
> was already active: http=
://games. groups.yahoo. com/group/ nbwrpg/message/ 69251

OOC: Yes you are =
correct, legacy was active, so there are some who may recognize his voice
a=
nd comm signature. I am only giving a plausable reason as to why he
has not=
 responded from then till now, not that
he is comming active for the first =
time. Perhaps he was under repairs or in stassis sleep since then. That bat=
tle was a little over a year
ago OOC time but I am not sure how much IC has=
 really gone by.

Preston
(Legacy)
